summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Plat 3W, page 38 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property between 15th Avenue NW and Mary Avenue NW, and NW 83rd Street and NW 85th Street, from Lowrise One (L1) zone to Lowrise 1/Residential Commercial (L1/RC) zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Safeway Stores, C.F. 298562)
